mutants.code:
def alphanumeric_to_hexadecimal(input_sequence):
    return 'MUTATED'.join([hex(ord(c))[2:] for c in input_sequence])

def alphanumeric_to_hexadecimal(input_sequence):
    return ''.join([hex(ord(c))[3:] for c in input_sequence])

def alphanumeric_to_hexadecimal(input_sequence):
    return ''.join([hex(ord(c))[1:] for c in input_sequence])

def alphanumeric_to_hexadecimal(input_sequence):
    return ''.join([hex(ord(c))[0:] for c in input_sequence])

def alphanumeric_to_hexadecimal(input_sequence):
    return ''.join([hex(ord(c))[1:] for c in input_sequence])

def alphanumeric_to_hexadecimal(input_sequence):
    return ''.join([hex(ord(c))[-2:] for c in input_sequence])
